### [Government](https://www.renotx.gov/government/)



City of Reno is a Type A General Law Municipality. The governing body, known as the City Council, consists of a Mayor and Five Council Members, who are elected by the City of Reno citizens.
[gsearch-search rootfolderid="14Rto9Ev4\_UdQSEj3cIE9UYZZQ4o\_qS\_A" ]

### [Community](https://www.renotx.gov/community/)



RENO, TEXAS (Parker County)
The City of Reno incorporated November 8, 1966. It is the second largest city in Parker County. Reno is on FM 1542 near Fort Worth eighteen miles northeast of Weatherford in the northeastern corner of Parker County. A small portion of the city extends into Tarrant County....
